text:
Awakening to New Realities

Razumihin wakes, troubled and serious.  
His mind races with yesterday’s events.  

Razumihin: “What was I thinking?”  

Razumihin: “I was base and mean!”  

Razumihin: “How could I judge him?”  

---  

Reflections on unattainable dreams.  
He feels shame wash over him.  

Razumihin: “That dream... so hopeless.”  

Razumihin: “I must face reality now.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin wakes up troubled by the realization of his unworthy behavior and the unattainability of his dreams.
